Articles.Content:
This is an idea I've had for a while. For the War Thunder community, there is a site called War Thunder Live where users can share just general thoughts, opinions, skins, etc. ( live.warthunder.com , format is kind of like that of a social media site). I think that it would be interesting to have a similar site for War Thunder where users could share ships, KSP related images and memes, quotes, (maybe even ships and mods...) etc.

It would probably be cool but unlikely...

Edited February 13, 2016 by TheSpaceManiac
